item.title: How to Automatically Archive Twitch Streams - The Hard Way
item.description: If you’re like me, simply downloading Twitch VODs aren’t good enough. The major one for me is that VODs will have copyrighted content muted, so if the stream has a copyrighted song playing, an entire 5+ minute chunk of the video will be muted. You can get around this by streaming the stream to a local file with streamlink. Pretty simple, until you want it to not be. Let’s make it difficult, with powershell scripting, timed scripts, and error handling!

item.title: Projects
item.description: I’m constantly tinkering with stuff, either through code or physical projects, and often both at the same time. Here is a list of all the things I’ve been up to that I’m proud of Keyboards and Keyboard Firmware QMK Firmware Contributor I helped port the QMK custom firmware to the YMD96, a keyboard I bought. Others have since built on what I started and made the keyboard firmware even better.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is Andrew Novak. I’m currently attending Purdue University for my BS in Computer Engineering (BSCmpE). My areas of interest are semiconductor engineering, cryptography, server hardware, and keyboards.
